chapter.name: Namespace exploration and queries
chapter.h2: Send and receive values to models
chapter.p: This tutorial shows some strategies to navigate or organize the namespace of your main patcher application. As the model number grows in your main patcher, navigation within the full Jamoma namespace can be complex. This shows some features provided by j.namespace for example to help circumvent queries, filter in models you want to work with, etc.

seealsolist.seealso: Listening to model's parameters or returns values
Declare a patcher as a model
